Entry.name: B
Entry.value: Back Order Only If New Item

Entry.name: K
Entry.value: Small Purchase Set Aside for Small Businesses

Entry.name: O
Entry.value: Back Order If Items Are Out of Stock or Not Yet Published

Entry.name: P
Entry.value: Large Purchase, Set-Aside for Small Business

Entry.name: R
Entry.value: Combined Small, Disadvantaged Business and Labor Surplus Area Set-Aside

Entry.name: S
Entry.value: Partial Labor Surplus Area Set Aside

Entry.name: T
Entry.value: Small Business with Small, Disadvantaged Business Consideration Set-Aside

Entry.name: Y
Entry.value: Back Order if Out of Stock

Entry.name: AA
Entry.value: Add Quantity to Make Minimum Weight Requirement

Entry.name: AB
Entry.value: Notify Prior to Shipment if Quantity Specified is not Available

Entry.name: BC
Entry.value: Restricted to Historically Black College or University or Minority Institution

Entry.name: IP
Entry.value: Restricted to Industrial Preparedness Program Participants

Entry.name: QE
Entry.value: Exclude Import Quota in First Cost

Entry.name: QI
Entry.value: Include Import Quota in First Cost

Entry.name: QP
Entry.value: Restricted to Qualified Products List (QPL) Products

Entry.name: SG
Entry.value: Small Remaining Balance Cancellation Not Allowed

Entry.name: SQ
Entry.value: Ship Partial, Item Qty Proportional To Total Order

Entry.name: SW
Entry.value: Ship Per Release or Buyer Authorization

Entry.name: UC
Entry.value: Restricted to U.S. and Canadian Sources
